// so we can't directly initialize here.
window.getBugsnag = function getBugsnag() {
  if (window.bugsnagClient) {
    return window.bugsnagClient;
  }
  try {
    window.bugsnagClient = window.bugsnag({
      apiKey: "c56fcdaa924b54713033e5e0fb981788",
      autoNotify: true,
      appVersion: "009f676dc930eac704cd4fcee0bef47d8a43c414",
      releaseStage: "production",
      beforeSend: function(report) {
        // When the report request url starts with "file://", it means that someone is
        // running Webflow via downloaded files. We ignore these errors to reduce
        // noise in our Bugsnag.
        if (
          report &&
          report.request &&
          report.request.url &&
          /^file:\/\//.test(report.request.url)
        ) {
          report.ignore();
          return;
        }
      },
    });
    return window.bugsnagClient;
  } catch (e) {
    console.error(e);
  }
}</script><script src="https://js.stripe.com/v3/" type="text/javascript"></script><script type="text/javascript" src="//use.typekit.net/rau7iug.js"></script><script src="https://unpkg.com/@lottiefiles/lottie-player@1.3.1/dist/lottie-player.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">try{Typekit.load({async: true});}catch(e){}
</script><script type="text/javascript" src="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/gen/js/entrypoint-dashboard-legacy.55d14f11747d6db39874.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/gen/css/entrypoint-dashboard-legacy.39d2ecd20daecf994074.css"><link ref="apple-touch-icon" href="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/static/default_webclip.bf1854db3d.png"><link rel="icon" href="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/static/default_favicon.1d66085a39.png"><script>//- attributes == {apiKey: "", source: "", hostUrl: "", authenticated: true/false}
var source = 'dashboard';
var hostUrl = '';
var authenticated = Boolean(false);

var forceFalse = false;
// When ipstack is not loaded window.wf_continentCode is undefined and
// segment consent manager doesn't require consent. We assume consent for
// authenticated users
switch (source) {
  case 'dashboard':
    // If in iframe we don't want consent banner to pop up so we don't load ipstack,
    // but we also use parent window consent manager settings for analytics
    if (!authenticated) {
      initCallbacks();
      loadIpStack();
    }
    break;
  case 'designer-preview':
    // When loading preview.webflow.com/... we don't know if a user is
    // authenticated or not so we need to call this extra endpoint
    initCallbacks();
    isAuthenticated(function(authenticated) {
      if (!authenticated) {
        loadIpStack();
      } else {
        // Needed to resolve wf_isEU
        forceFalse = true;
      }
    });
    break;
  // Default: do nothing
  // Users in Designer are always authenticated so we don't need to detect
  // EU continent because we assume consent
}

function initCallbacks() {
  // ipstack docs: https://ipstack.com/documentation
  window.wf_onDetectContinent = function(ipstackResponseJson) {
    window.wf_continentCode = ipstackResponseJson.continent_code; 
    window.wf_userLocation = {
      country_code: ipstackResponseJson.country_code,
      city: ipstackResponseJson.city
    }
  };

  window.wf_isEU = function() {
    // In order to be GDPR-compliant, we want to treat users from unidentified continent
    // as if they were from EU and in result – show them cookie consent manager
    // instead of assuming the consent was given:
    var fallbackValue = true;
    
    if (forceFalse) {
      return false;
    }
    if (typeof window.wf_continentCode === 'string') {
      return window.wf_continentCode === 'EU';
    }
    if (typeof Promise === 'undefined') {
      return fallbackValue;
    }
    
    // There could be a race condition and wf_continentCode be undefined
    return new Promise(function(resolve) {
      var i = 0;
      var interval = setInterval(function() {
        // Resolve it if:
        // - ipstack has loaded and window.wf_continentCode is defined
        // - 5 seconds passed and wf_continentCode is still undefined
        // - forceFalse is true (used in preview sites when user is authenticated)
        if (forceFalse) {
          clearInterval(interval);
          return resolve(false);
        }
        if (i++ >= 50) {
          clearInterval(interval);
          return resolve(fallbackValue);
        }
        if (typeof window.wf_continentCode === 'string') {
          clearInterval(interval);
          return resolve(window.wf_continentCode === 'EU');
        }
      }, 100);
    });
  };
}

function loadIpStack() {
  var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
  var ipstackScript = document.createElement("script");
  ipstackScript.src = "https://api.ipstack.com/check?access_key=53038fede8e664ed0b2e5274047e23a8&fields=continent_code,country_code,city&callback=wf_onDetectContinent";
  head.appendChild(ipstackScript);
}

function isAuthenticated(cb) {
  var xmlhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
  xmlhttp.open("GET", hostUrl + '/api/user/readOnlyData');
  xmlhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json;charset=UTF-8");
  xmlhttp.withCredentials = true;
  xmlhttp.onload = function() {
    if (xmlhttp.status === 200) {
      cb(true);
    } else {
      cb(false);
    }
  };
  xmlhttp.send();
}</script><script>// Adapted from Tatari snippet https://www.tatari.tv/dashboard/webflow/settings/tracker
function initTatari() {
  try {
    !function(t, i) {
      if(!i.version) {
        window.tatari = i;

        i.init = function(t, n) {
          var _init = function(t, n) {
            i[n] = function() {
              t.push([n].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 0)));
            }
          };

          "track pageview identify".split(" ").forEach(function(t) {
            _init(i, t);
          });

          i._i = t;
          i.config = n;
          //- i.pageview(); Deferring this to after loading
        };

        i.version = "1.2.1";

        var tatariScript = t.createElement("script");
        tatariScript.type = "text/javascript";
        tatariScript.async = true;
        tatariScript.src = "https://d2hrivdxn8ekm8.cloudfront.net/tag-manager/d630b21c-157d-42d8-99b3-c39efdccca56-latest.js";

        var firstScript = t.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
        firstScript.parentNode.insertBefore(tatariScript, firstScript);
      }
    }(document, window.tatari || []);
  } catch(_e) {
    console.error(_e);
  }

  tatari.init('d630b21c-157d-42d8-99b3-c39efdccca56');

  if (!isInIframe()) {
    // This logic is a bit convoluted due to GDPR and how we use iframes on
    // marketing pages. We don't load ipstack on iframes to avoid doing
    // too many requests (already loaded on the parent window) so we don't
    // know if they're in EU or not. So here we need to avoid firing
    // pageview if in iframe, but we still want to load the library in order
    // to fire 'sign up' event (which we can regardless of GDPR because
    // users accept our cookie policy when signing up)
    tatari.pageview();
  }
};

function isInIframe() {
  try {
    return window.self !== window.top;
  } catch (e) {
    return true;
  }
}

// wf_isEU is undefined for logged in users, because we don't need to check
// tracking preferences for GDPR
if (typeof window.wf_isEU !== 'function') {
  initTatari();
} else {
  // Can be either a boolean or a promise
  var isEU = window.wf_isEU();
  // Only init if not in EU
  if (typeof isEU === 'boolean') {
    !isEU && initTatari();
  } else {
    isEU.then(function(_isEU) {
      !_isEU && initTatari();
    });
  }
}</script><script type="text/javascript">!function(){var analytics=window.analytics=window.analytics||[];if(!analytics.initialize)if(analytics.invoked)window.console&&console.error&&console.error("Segment snippet included twice.");else{analytics.invoked=!0;analytics.methods=["trackSubmit","trackClick","trackLink","trackForm","pageview","identify","reset","group","track","ready","alias","debug","page","once","off","on","addSourceMiddleware","addIntegrationMiddleware","setAnonymousId","addDestinationMiddleware"];analytics.factory=function(e){return function(){var t=Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);t.unshift(e);analytics.push(t);return analytics}};for(var e=0;e<analytics.methods.length;e++){var key=analytics.methods[e];analytics[key]=analytics.factory(key)}analytics.load=function(key,e){var t=document.createElement("script");t.type="text/javascript";t.async=!0;t.src="https://analytics.webflow.com/analytics.js/v1/" + key + "/analytics.min.js";var n=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n);analytics._loadOptions=e};analytics._writeKey="HlVltpDBBALnaRsc8DwEzz8sjydSYtS5";analytics._cdn="https://analytics.webflow.com";;analytics.SNIPPET_VERSION="4.15.3";

  var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(input, "text/html");
  return doc.documentElement.textContent;
}

0 &amp;&amp; expectedCharge.value &gt; 0">The amount due today includes a {{ debitsDiff | abs | formatMoney }} balance that couldn't be charged previously.</li><li>We will bill you {{ priceTotal() | formatMoney }} + applicable taxes, for this plan every {{ planPeriod }} on {{ startDateText(selectedBill) }}, unless you cancel.</li></ul></div><stripe-elements-error data-automation-id="CardEntry-error-message" class="hide alert danger"></stripe-elements-error><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert danger" ng-show="errorMessage"><span><span ng-bind-html="errorMessage"></span></span></div><button on-click-with-stripe-token="confirm(token)" billing-target-id="targetId" skip-token-if="billingInfo.activeCardSource || !ccRequired" ng-disabled="submitDisabled()" data-automation-id="CardEntry-upgrade-link" class="button checkout-btn"><span ng-hide="checkoutInProgress"><i class="icon lock-medium-white"></i>Pay {{ totalDueToday() | formatMoney:expectedCharge.unit }} USD now</span><div ng-show="checkoutInProgress" class="spinner-small spinner-small--dark"></div></button></div></div></div><ng-include src="'loadingOverlay.html'" ng-show="loading"></ng-include></div></div></script><script id="billingFrequency.html" type="text/ng-template"><div data-automation-id="checkout-modal-section-billing-frequency" class="checkout-block"><h3>Billing frequency</h3><div class="checkout-radiogroup"><label for="radio-annual" ng-class="{ &quot;checkout-radio--active&quot;: planPeriod === &quot;year&quot; Setting a password here will overwrite those passwords.</span></div><form name="legacyAuthForm" novalidate="novalidate" ng-if="showPasswordForm &amp;&amp; hasLegacyPassword" class="offset-form site-password"><div class="username field"><label for="authUser">User:</label><input value="{{ site.authUser }}" type="text" name="authUser" ng-model="site.authUser" ng-minlength="4" required="required"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="(legacyAuthForm.authUser.$error.minlength)" ng-cloak="ng-cloak"><span>Must be at least 4 characters</span></div></div><div class="password field"><label for="authPassword">Password:</label><input type="password" name="authPassword" ng-model="site.authPassword" ng-minlength="4" placeholder="{{site.authStr ? &quot;●●●●●●●●&quot; class="main-content"><div id="backups" class="section"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Backups</h3></div><div class="help big">Webflow backs up your site when you press Cmd+Shift+S (or Ctrl+Shift+S on Windows) and on every 
10th auto-save. It also creates a backup of the current state whenever you restore an older version.</div><ul ng-show="versions.length &gt; 0" class="list"><li ng-repeat="version in versions"><div class="time"><span class="from-now">{{ version.createdOn | fromNow }}</span><div class="all-caps-small"><span ng-show="user | isAdmin" copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ version.path }}" class="link">{{ version.createdOn | date }} </span><a ng-show="user | isAdmin" ng-href="/api/snapshot_styles?path={{ version.path }}" target="_blank" class="link">(Debug)</a><span ng-hide="user | isAdmin">{{ version.createdOn | date }}</span></div></div><div class="version-details"><div ng-show="version.custom" class="title"><strong>{{ version.desc }}</strong></div><div ng-show="!version.custom" class="title">Automatic backup</div><div class="details"><div><i class="icon summary-pages"></i>{{ version.pages }} pages</div><div><i class="icon summary-styles"></i>{{ version.totalStyles || 0 }} styles</div><div><i class="icon summary-nodes"></i>{{ version.totalNodes }} elements</div></div></div><div class="buttons"><a ng-click="publishInProgress || restore($event, version, $index)" ng-disabled="publishInProgress || version.disabled || disabled" ng-attr-uib-tooltip="{{ version.disabled ? restoreTooltip : &quot;&quot; }}" class="button pull-right"><span ng-show="restoringVersion === $index &amp;&amp; disabled">Restoring...</span><span ng-hide="restoringVersion === $index &amp;&amp; disabled"><i class="icon restore"></i>Restore</span></a><a open-designer="open-designer" site-name="{{ site.shortName }}" preview-version="{{ version._id }}" target="_blank" ng-show="version.supportsPreview" class="button secondary pull-right"><i class="icon preview"></i>Preview</a></div></li></ul><a ng-click="loadVersions()" ng-show="showLoadMore" class="button secondary full-width"> <i class="icon show-more"></i>Load More</a><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-show="versions.length &lt; 1"><span>No versions exist for this site.</span></div></div><div id="original-version" ng-show="originalVersion" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Original Version</h3><div class="help big">The original version of this site is always available to restore.</div></div><ul ng-show="originalVersion" class="list"><li><div class="time"><span class="from-now">{{ originalVersion.createdOn | fromNow }}</span><div class="all-caps-small"><span ng-show="user | isAdmin" copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ originalVersion.path }}" class="link">{{ originalVersion.createdOn | date }}</span><span ng-hide="user | isAdmin">{{ originalVersion.createdOn | date }}</span></div></div><div class="version-details"><div class="title"><span>{{ originalVersion.desc }}</span></div><div class="details"><div><i class="icon summary-pages"></i>{{ originalVersion.pages }} pages</div><div><i class="icon summary-styles"></i>{{ originalVersion.totalStyles || 0 }} styles</div><div><i class="icon summary-nodes"></i>{{ originalVersion.totalNodes }} elements</div></div></div><div class="buttons"><a ng-click="restore($event, originalVersion, -1)" ng-disabled="disabled" class="button pull-right"><span ng-show="restoringVersion === -1 &amp;&amp; Need help? <a href="https://university.webflow.com/faq/how-do-i-set-up-custom-domain-hosting-with-my-webflow-site" target="_blank">Learn how to set up custom domain hosting</a>.</div><div ng-show="siteCaps.allowPublishDomain" class="help big">Add your domain(s) below or buy a new Google  or GoDaddy Domain. Need help? <a href="https://university.webflow.com/faq/how-do-i-set-up-custom-domain-hosting-with-my-webflow-site" target="_blank">Learn how to set up custom domain hosting</a>.</div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline" ng-show="site.sslHosting"><span><div>Note: Some DNS providers don’t support using SSL on the root domain (the version without www). Learn more about <a ng-href="https://university.webflow.com/article/setting-the-root-domain-as-the-default-domain-on-ssl-hosting" target="_blank">setting up SSL on your root domain.</a></div></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!siteCaps.allowPublishDomain"><span>Upgrade to a paid site plan to add or purchase custom domain(s).&nbsp;<a ng-href="#" ng-click="upgrade({ref: 'dash_custom_domain'})" class="orange">Add a site plan.</a></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert success" ng-show="!siteCaps.allowPublishDomain &amp;&amp; domains.length &gt; 0"><span>You are currently on a legacy hosting plan: {{ hostingPlan.displayName }}.</span></div><ul ng-show="siteCaps.allowPublishDomain || hasSubscription || domains.length &gt; 0" class="list domains"><li ng-repeat="domain in domains track by $index" ng-mouseenter="showDefaultButton(domain)" ng-mouseleave="hideDefaultButton(domain)" data-automation-id="domain-wrapper-{{domain.name}}"><div class="domain-wrapper"><div class="globe-icon"><i ng-if="!domain.isSubGoogleDomain &amp;&amp; !site.sslHosting" class="icon domain"></i><i ng-if="!domain.isSubGoogleDomain &amp;&amp; site.sslHosting &amp;&amp; !domainSetup.isValid(domain.name)" class="icon domain-ssl-pending"></i><i ng-if="!domain.isSubGoogleDomain &amp;&amp; site.sslHosting &amp;&amp; domainSetup.isValid(domain.name)" class="icon domain-ssl-success"></i><i uib-tooltip="{{domain.name}} is managed by Google Domains." ng-if="domain.isSubGoogleDomain" class="icon google-icon"></i></div><div class="domain-info"><span class="domain-name">{{ domain.name }}</span><a href="#" ng-show="domain.default" ng-click="removeDefault(domain)" uib-tooltip="{{domain.name}} is the default domain. Please set www.{{ domain.name }} as the default domain.</div></div></span></div><h4>Option 2 - If you want to use the root domain ({{ domain.name }}) as the default domain</h4><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline" ng-show="domainSetup.isCf(domain.name)"><span><div class="line">On your domain registrar's admin console, set up the <span class="heavy">CNAME, ANAME, <span ng-if="!getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt')">or ALIAS:</span><span ng-if="getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt')">or ALIAS, and the TXT record:</span></span><table class="info-table"><thead class="header-row"><tr><th class="header grey">TYPE</th><th class="header grey">NAME</th><th class="header grey">VALUE</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">CNAME/ANAME/ALIAS</span></td><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">@</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'cname') }}" class="greenbox">{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'cname') }}</span></td></tr><tr ng-if="getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt') "><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">TXT</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt').name }}" class="greenbox">{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt').name }}</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt').value }}" class="greenbox">{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt').value }}</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline" ng-show="!domainSetup.isCf(domain.name)"><span><div>Looks like your DNS provider doesn't support this option. Learn more about <a ng-href="https://university.webflow.com/article/setting-the-root-domain-as-the-default-domain-on-ssl-hosting" target="_blank">setting up SSL on your root domain.</a></div></span></div></div><div ng-if="!showFastlyAsEdgeIPs &amp;&amp; domainSetup.isApex(domain.name) &amp;&amp; !site.sslHosting" class="apex-domain-errors domain-errors"><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline"><span><div class="line">Visit the admin console of your domain registrar (the website you purchased your domain from) and create {{ getDnsRecords(false, true, domain, 'ips').length | numberWord }} <span class="heavy">A Records:</span><table class="info-table"><thead class="header-row"><tr><th class="header grey">TYPE</th><th class="header grey">NAME</th><th class="header grey">VALUE</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr ng-repeat="ip in getDnsRecords(false, true, domain, 'ips')"><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">A</span></td><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">@</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ ip }}" class="greenbox">{{ ip }}</span></td></tr></tbody></table><div class="dns-note">This process will redirect to {{ domain.name }}. plan: {{ hostingPlan.displayName }}.</span></div></div><div id="redirects" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>301 Redirects</h3></div><div class="help big"> 
Redirect old URLs to new ones so that you don't lose precious search engine ranking. 
Redirect to a page, full domain, or setup wildcard rules to migrate sets of pages. <a href="https://university.webflow.com/faq/setting-up-301-redirects-for-multiple-pages-with-wildcards" target="_blank">Learn more about wildcard redirect rules</a></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!siteCaps.allow301"><span>To unlock 301 redirects for this site,&nbsp;<a href="#" ng-click="upgrade({ref: '301_redirects'})" class="orange">add a site plan.</a></span></div><form name="redirectForm" novalidate="novalidate" ng-show="siteCaps.allow301" class="site-redirects"><div class="old-path field"><label>Old path:</label><input type="text" required="required" placeholder="/stuff.html" name="path" ng-model="redirectPath" ng-pattern="/^/[A-Za-z0-9@._?=%+&amp;/()*-]+$/"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="redirectForm.path.$error.pattern &amp;&amp; redirectForm.$dirty"><span>Path must start with "/", can only contain alphanumeric characters, as well as the following characters: ".", "_", "?", "=", "%", "+", "&amp;", "/", "(", ")", "*", "-", "@".</span></div></div><div class="arrow"><i class="icon arrow-right-big-black"></i></div><div class="new-path field"><label>Redirect to path:</label><input type="text" required="required" placeholder="/about or http://webflow.com" name="redirectTarget" ng-model="redirectTarget" ng-pattern="/[A-Za-z0-9._%+&amp;/-]+$/"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="redirectForm.redirectTarget.$error.pattern &amp;&amp; redirectForm.$dirty"><span>Target path can only contain alphanumeric characters, as well as the following characters: ".", "_", "%", "+", "&amp;", "/", "-".</span></div></div><div class="save"><label>&nbsp;</label><button ng-click="addRedirect()" ng-disabled="redirectForm.$invalid || savingRedirects" class="button success">Add Redirect Path</button></div></form><div ng-show="redirects.length &gt; 0"><div class="label">Redirect Paths:</div><ul class="list redirects-list"><li ng-repeat="redirect in redirects">{{ redirect.src }}<i class="icon arrow-right-big-black"></i><i class="icon page"></i>{{ redirect.target }} <span ng-if="redirect.target === '/'" class="all-caps-small">Home Page</span><a href="#" ng-click="removeRedirect(redirect.src)" ng-disabled="savingRedirects" data-automation-id="remove-redirect-icon" class="pull-right"><i class="icon delete-medium solo"></i></a></li></ul></div></div><div id="publishing" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3 id="pub-options">Advanced Publishing Options</h3></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish"><span> </span></div><span>These options are only available for sites with site plans. <a href="#" ng-click="upgrade({ref: 'adv_publishing'})" class="orange">Add a site plan.</a></span><form name="pubOptionsForm" novalidate="novalidate"><div class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="site.sslHosting" ng-disabled="checkoutEnabled || usysEnabled"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span>Enable SSL</span><span ng-if="ng-if"><i uib-tooltip="Add an SSL certificate to your website for increased security and SEO benefits." class="icon help-tip lightest"></i></span><span><i uib-tooltip="Add an SSL certificate to your website for increased security and SEO benefits. This option is always enabled for Ecommerce sites." class="icon help-tip lightest"></i></span></div></div></div><div class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.minifyHtml" ng-disabled="!siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Minify HTML<i uib-tooltip="Minifying can help your live website load faster, but makes your code a little harder to read.It can also fix spacing issues with inline-block elements." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.uglifyCss" ng-disabled="!siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Minify CSS<i uib-tooltip="Minifying can help your live website load faster, but makes your code a little harder to read." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.minifyJs" ng-disabled="!siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Minify JS<i uib-tooltip="Minifying can help your live website load faster, but makes your code a little harder to read." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div class="field"><div ng-if="!ecommEnabled &amp;&amp; !usysEnabled" class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.secureFrameHeaders" ng-disabled="!siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Use Secure Frame Headers<i uib-tooltip="Protects your site from several kinds of clickjacking attacks by restricting where your site can be embedded. Keep it turned off if you want others to be able to iframe your site." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div><div ng-if="ecommEnabled || usysEnabled" class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.secureFrameHeaders" ng-disabled="true"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Use Secure Frame Headers<i uib-tooltip="Protects your site from several kinds of clickjacking attacks by restricting where your site can be embedded. Keep it turned off if you want others to be able to iframe your site.This option is always enabled for Ecommerce sites." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div ng-show="allowCustomSiteHeader" class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.hstsHeader"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Enable HSTS<i uib-tooltip="HSTS will only be effective on a site with a custom domain." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div ng-show="allowCustomSiteHeader" class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.hstsWithSubdomains" ng-disabled="!siteMeta.hstsHeader"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Enable HSTS for subdomains<i uib-tooltip="HSTS can only be enabled on subdomains if the root site also has HSTS enabled." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><div ng-show="allowCustomSiteHeader" class="field"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.hstsWithPreload" ng-disabled="!siteMeta.hstsHeader"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border">Enable HSTS Preload Header<i uib-tooltip="HSTS Preload will tell browsers to submit your site to the preload list. Danger: this can cause your site to become unreachable if you use http anywhere on any subdomain if you have the subdomains enabled too." class="icon help-tip"></i></div></div></div><button ng-disabled="!pubOptionsForm.$dirty" ng-click="savePublishOptions()" ng-show="siteCaps.allowAdvancedPublish" class="button">Save Changes</button></form></div><div id="customHeaders" ng-show="allowCustomSiteHeader" class="section field"><div class="section-header"><h3>Custom Headers</h3><button ng-disabled="!pubOptionsForm.$dirty" ng-click="savePublishOptions()" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="customHeaders">Enable Custom Site Headers</label><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="siteMeta.hasCustomHeaders" on-label="Yes" off-label="No"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="siteMeta.hasCustomHeaders">Set Custom Security Headers</span><span ng-if="!siteMeta.hasCustomHeaders">Use default headers</span></div></div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">When you turn this on, Webflow will allow you to set custom security headers for your site                         </div></div></div><div ng-show="siteMeta.hasCustomHeaders" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><div class="row"><div class="field col-lg-6 col-sm-12"><label>Header:<div class="select-wrap"><select ng-value="h" ng-model="customHeader" name="newHeader" ng-options="h for h in allowedHeaderOptions" ng-change="changeSelectedHeaderVars()" class="customHeaders"><option value="">Select Header...</option></select></div><div class="select-arrow"></div></label></div><div class="field col-lg-6 col-sm-12"> <label>Value:<input type="text" required="required" placeholder="Header Value" name="headerValue" ng-model="customHeaderValue" ng-pattern="/[ -~]+/"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="pubOptionsForm.headerValue.$error.pattern &amp;&amp; pubOptionsForm.$dirty"><span>Header Values must only contain printable ascii characters.</span></div></label></div></div><div class="row"><div class="field col-lg-6 col-sm-12"><button ng-disabled="!hasSelectedHeader()" ng-click="addCustomHeader()" href="#" class="button">Add header</button></div></div></div></div><div ng-show="siteMeta.hasCustomHeaders &amp;&amp; siteMeta.customHeaders.length" class="field row"><div class="col-md-12"><label>Current Headers:</label><ul class="list"><li ng-repeat="header in siteMeta.customHeaders">{{ header.key}} :
{{ header.value }}<a href="#" ng-click="removeCustomHeader(header, $index)" ng-disabled="removing" class="pull-right"><i class="icon delete-medium solo"></i></a></li></ul></div></div></div><ng-include src="'customSSLCerts.html'"></ng-include></div></div></div></script><script id="siteDetails_publishing.html" type="text/ng-template"><ng-include src="'siteHeader.html'"></ng-include><div ng-controller="SitePublishingCtrl" loading-element="loading-element" class="container publishing-tab"><div class="loaded"><ng-include src="'siteMenu.html'"></ng-include><div data-automation-id="main-content" class="main-content hosting"><ng-include src="'customDomainsSection.html'"></ng-include><div id="redirects" class="section redirects"><div class="section-header"><h3>301 Redirects</h3></div><div class="help big"> 
Redirect old URLs to new ones so that you don't lose precious search engine ranking. 
Redirect to a page, full domain, or setup wildcard rules to migrate sets of pages. <a href="https://university.webflow.com/faq/setting-up-301-redirects-for-multiple-pages-with-wildcards" target="_blank">Learn more about wildcard redirect rules</a></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!siteCaps.allow301"><span>To unlock 301 redirects for this site,&nbsp;<a href="/dashboard/sites/{{site.shortName}}/billing?ref=301_redirects" class="orange">add a site plan.</a></span></div><form name="redirectForm" novalidate="novalidate" ng-show="siteCaps.allow301" class="site-redirects"><div class="old-path field"><label>Old path:</label><input type="text" required="required" placeholder="/stuff.html" name="path" ng-model="redirectPath" ng-pattern="/^/[A-Za-z0-9@._?=%+&amp;/()*-]+$/"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="redirectForm.path.$error.pattern &amp;&amp; redirectForm.$dirty"><span>Path must start with "/", can only contain alphanumeric characters, as well as the following characters: ".", "_", "?", "=", "%", "+", "&amp;", "/", "(", ")", "*", "-", "@".</span></div></div><div class="arrow"><i class="icon arrow-right-big-black"></i></div><div class="new-path field"><label>Redirect to path:</label><input type="text" required="required" placeholder="/about or http://webflow.com" name="redirectTarget" ng-model="redirectTarget" ng-pattern="/[A-Za-z0-9._%+&amp;/-]+$/"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="redirectForm.redirectTarget.$error.pattern &amp;&amp; redirectForm.$dirty"><span>Target path can only contain alphanumeric characters, as well as the following characters: ".", "_", "%", "+", "&amp;", "/", "-".</span></div></div><div class="save"><label>&nbsp;</label><button ng-click="addRedirect()" ng-disabled="redirectForm.$invalid || savingRedirects" class="button success">Add Redirect Path</button></div></form><div ng-show="redirects.length &gt; 0"><div class="label">Redirect Paths:</div><ul class="list redirects-list"><li ng-repeat="redirect in redirects">{{ redirect.src }}<i class="icon arrow-right-big-black"></i><i class="icon page"></i>{{ redirect.target }} <span ng-if="redirect.target === '/'" class="all-caps-small">Home Page</span><a href="#" ng-click="removeRedirect(redirect.src)" ng-disabled="savingRedirects" class="pull-right"><i class="icon delete-medium solo"></i></a></li></ul></div></div><ng-include src="'advancedPublishingOptions.html'"></ng-include><ng-include src="'customSSLCerts.html'"></ng-include></div></div></div></script><script id="customDomainsSection.html" type="text/ng-template"><div id="domains" class="section domains"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Custom Domains</h3></div><div ng-show="!siteCaps.allowPublishDomain" class="help big">Once you have a site plan, you can add your domain(s) below or buy a new Google  or GoDaddy Domain. Please check&nbsp;<a href="{{domainSetup.getDnssecDiagnosticUrl(domain.name)}}" target="_blank">{{domainSetup.getDnssecDiagnosticUrl(domain.name)}}</a><span>.</span></span></div><div ng-if="!showFastlyAsEdgeIPs &amp;&amp; domainSetup.isApex(domain.name) &amp;&amp; site.sslHosting" class="apex-domain-ssl-errors domain-errors"><h4 class="padding-top-small">Option 1 (recommended) - If you want this domain to redirect to www.{{ domain.name }}</h4><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline"><span><div class="line">Visit the admin console of your domain registrar (the website you bought your domain from) and create {{ getDnsRecords(true, true, domain, 'ips').length | numberWord }} <span class="heavy">A Records:</span><table class="info-table"><thead class="header-row"><tr><th class="header grey">TYPE</th><th class="header grey">NAME</th><th class="header grey">VALUE</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr ng-repeat="ip in getDnsRecords(true, true, domain, 'ips')"><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">A</span></td><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">@</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ ip }}" class="greenbox">{{ ip }}</span></td></tr></tbody></table><div class="dns-note">This process will only redirect to www.{{ domain.name }}. Please set www.{{ domain.name }} as the default domain.</div></div></span></div><h4>Option 2 - If you want to use the root domain ({{ domain.name }}) as the default domain</h4><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline" ng-show="domainSetup.isCf(domain.name)"><span><div class="line">On your domain registrar's admin console, set up the <span class="heavy">CNAME, ANAME, <span ng-if="!getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt')">or ALIAS:</span><span ng-if="getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt')">or ALIAS, and the TXT record:</span></span><table class="info-table"><thead class="header-row"><tr><th class="header grey">TYPE</th><th class="header grey">NAME</th><th class="header grey">VALUE</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">CNAME/ANAME/ALIAS</span></td><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">@</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'cname') }}" class="greenbox">{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'cname') }}</span></td></tr><tr ng-if="getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt') "><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">TXT</span></td><td class="item"><span class="greenbox">@</span></td><td class="item"><span copy-to-clipboard="copy-to-clipboard" data-clipboard-text="{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt') }}" class="greenbox">{{ getDnsRecords(true, false, domain, 'txt') }}</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert no-icon multiline" ng-show="!domainSetup.isCf(domain.name)"><span><div>Looks like your DNS provider doesn't support this option. ng-disabled="checkoutEnabled || usysEnabled"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span>Enable SSL</span><span ng-if="ng-if"><i uib-tooltip="Add an SSL certificate to your website for "" : ", "}}</span></div></div></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert danger" ng-show="typeKitError"><span><span><p>Error returned by Adobe Fonts: <strong ng-repeat="err in typeKitError">{{ err }}. </strong></p><p>Have you checked your Adobe Fonts API token to see if it's correct?</p></span></span></div></div></form></div></div></div></div></script><script id="siteDetails_seo.html" type="text/ng-template"><ng-include src="'siteHeader.html'"></ng-include><div ng-controller="SiteSeoCtrl" loading-element="loading-element" class="container"><div class="loaded"><ng-include src="'siteMenu.html'"></ng-include><div data-automation-id="main-content" class="main-content"><form name="form" novalidate="novalidate"><div id="search-engine-optimization" class="section"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Search Engine Optimization</h3></div><div class="help big">You can set <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/editing-your-sites-seo-meta-title-and-description" target="_blank">SEO meta titles and descriptions</a>, as well as <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-edit-your-sites-og-title-description-and-image" target="_blank">Open Graph info </a>for individual pages and Collection items in the page settings in the Designer.</div></div><div id="seo" ng-if="showLegacySeoSettings()" class="section"> <div class="section-header"><h3>SEO Settings</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateSeo(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-12"><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span>Looks like you set a site-wide meta title and description. For better SEO results, create unique titles and descriptions for each page and Collection item in the Designer's page settings.   </span></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="seoTitle">Title Tag:</label><input value="{{ meta.seoTitle }}" type="text" name="seoTitle" ng-model="meta.seoTitle" ng-maxlength="256" placeholder="{{ site.name }}" class="showError"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.seoTitle.$invalid"><span>SEO Title must be less than 256 characters.</span></div><div ng-class="{ over: meta.seoTitle.length &gt; 70 }" ng-show="meta.seoTitle" class="char-count">{{ meta.seoTitle.length }} characters</div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down"><strong>Best Practices</strong><ul><li>Have a title that describes your site well.</li><li>Don’t go over 70 characters.</li><li>Use relevant keywords because Google will rank the page higher for these keywords.</li><li>Put important keywords in the front of the title for it to rank higher.</li></ul></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="seoDesc">Meta Description:</label><textarea value="{{ meta.seoDesc }}" type="text" name="seoDesc" ng-model="meta.seoDesc" ng-maxlength="2000"></textarea><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.seoDesc.$invalid"><span>SEO Description must be less than 2000 characters.</span></div><div ng-class="{ over: meta.seoDesc.length &gt; 2000 }" ng-show="meta.seoDesc" class="char-count">{{ meta.seoDesc.length }} characters</div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down"><strong>Best Practices</strong><ul><li>Have keywords that describe the page.</li><li>Don’t go over 160 characters.</li><li>Write your description for people, not robots. (Google doesn’t use descriptions in web rankings).</li></ul></div></div></div></div><div id="opengraph" ng-if="showLegacyOgSettings()" class="section"> <div class="section-header"><h3>Open Graph</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateSeo(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-12"><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span><span>For the best results, set unique Open Graph titles, descriptions, and images for each page of your site in the Designer's Pages panel.<a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-edit-your-sites-og-title-description-and-image" target="_blank"> Learn more about Open Graph Settings</a></span></span></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="ogTitle">Open Graph Title:</label><input value="{{ meta.ogTitle }}" type="text" name="ogTitle" ng-model="meta.ogTitle" ng-maxlength="256" placeholder="{{ meta.seoTitle || site.name }}" class="showError"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.ogTitle.$invalid"><span>Open Graph Title must be less than 256 characters.</span></div><div ng-class="{ over: meta.ogTitle.length &gt; 70 }" ng-show="meta.ogTitle" class="char-count">{{ meta.ogTitle.length }} characters</div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">Social networks like Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn use Open Graph titles, descriptions, and images when you share a link on their websites. Having trouble with Open Graph?<a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-troubleshoot-debug-facebook-open-graph-issues" target="_blank">Troubleshoot Facebook Open Graph Issues.</a></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="ogDesc">Open Graph Description:</label><textarea value="{{ meta.ogDesc }}" type="text" name="ogDesc" ng-model="meta.ogDesc" ng-maxlength="512"></textarea><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.ogDesc.$invalid"><span>Open Graph Description must be less than 512 characters.</span></div><div ng-class="{ over: meta.ogDesc.length &gt; 140 }" ng-show="meta.ogDesc" class="char-count">{{ meta.ogDesc.length }} characters</div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="ogImages">Open Graph Image:</label><input value="{{ meta.ogImages }}" type="text" name="ogImages" ng-model="meta.ogImages" placeholder="http://domain.com/image.jpg" class="showError"/></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">Insert image link directly. (ie: <a href="http://puu.sh/jte52/d7d32323e3.png" target="_blank">http://domain.com/image.jpg</a>)</div></div></div></div><div id="indexing" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Indexing</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateSeo(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="robots">Disable Webflow Subdomain Indexing</label><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="meta.disableSubIndex" on-label="Yes" off-label="No"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="meta.disableSubIndex">Indexing of http://{{ site.shortName }}.webflow.io is <strong>disabled</strong></span><span ng-if="!meta.disableSubIndex">Indexing of http://{{ site.shortName }}.webflow.io is <strong>enabled</strong></span></div></div></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">If indexing is disabled, a unique robots.txt will be published only on the subdomain telling search engines to ignore the domain. (The actual content is: User-Agent: * Disallow: /)</div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="robots">robots.txt</label><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!seoEnabled()"><span> <span>To unlock robots.txt options add a site plan to this site.&nbsp;</span><a href="/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=index">Add a site plan.</a></span></div><textarea value="{{ meta.robots }}" type="text" name="robots" ng-model="meta.robots" ng-minlength="4" ng-show="seoEnabled()"></textarea></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">Learn more about robots.txt here: <a href="http://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html" target="_blank">www.robotstxt.org</a>. If populated, this will be added to all of your pages.</div></div></div><div ng-if="seoEnabled() &amp;&amp; isEnterpriseSitePlan" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="robots">Remove sitemap.xml from robots.txt</label><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="meta.hideSitemapFromRobots" on-label="Yes" off-label="No"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="meta.hideSitemapFromRobots">sitemap.xml will <strong>not </strong>be added to robots.txt </span><span ng-if="!meta.hideSitemapFromRobots">sitemap.xml will be added to robots.txt </span></div></div></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">Enabling this removes the automatically generated sitemap.xml address within your robots.txt file. You can input a custom sitemap.xml link above.</div></div></div></div><div id="sitemap" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Sitemap</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateSeo(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="sitemap">Auto-generate Sitemap</label><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!seoEnabled()"><span> <span>To unlock auto-generated sitemaps add a site plan to this site.&nbsp;</span><a href="/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=auto_sitemap">Add a site plan.</a></span></div><div ng-show="seoEnabled()" class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="meta.defaultSitemap" on-label="Yes" off-label="No"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="meta.defaultSitemap">Automatically update sitemap.xml when site is published</span><span ng-if="!meta.defaultSitemap">Use custom sitemap.xml</span></div></div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">When you turn this on, Webflow will automatically update your sitemap when you publish your site, which can help with SEO. Sitemaps are located at your site's root level (your-site.com/sitemap.xml). <a href="https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/183668?vid=0-635803558094131134-280399586" target="_blank">Learn how to submit your sitemap to google</a></div></div></div><div ng-show="!meta.defaultSitemap" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8">         <label for="sitemap">Custom sitemap.xml            </label><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="!seoEnabled()"><span> <span>To unlock custom sitemaps, add a site plan to this site.&nbsp;</span><a href="/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=custom_sitemap">Add a site plan.</a></span></div><textarea type="text" name="sitemap" ng-model="meta.sitemap" ng-disabled="meta.defaultSitemap || !seoEnabled()"></textarea></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">If populated, sitemap.xml will be added to all of your custom domains. You will still need to submit your sitemap to: <a href="https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/183669?hl=en&amp;ref_topic=8476" target="_blank">Google Webmaster Tools</a></div></div></div></div><div id="google-site-verification" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Google Site Verification</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateAnalytics()" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="help big">Verifiying your site with Google will give you access to your website's private Google Search data. You will also be able to affect how Google Search crawls your site.</div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="googleVerification">Google Site Verification ID</label><input type="text" name="googleVerification" ng-model="meta.googleVerification" placeholder="e.g. x88atPHmzG1G2FBivU1bk-w398zDtL8Mci2AC2tYd4kw" ng-minlength="4" ng-pattern="/^[^&lt;&gt;&quot;]+$/" class="showError"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-show="form.googleVerification.$error.pattern"><span><p>The Google Site Verification ID shouldn't have &lt;, &gt;, or " characters. Make sure you're pasting in only the ID, and not the entire meta tag.</p></span></div></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">Visit <a href="https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/" targer="_blank">Google Search Console</a> to add and verify your site. <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-verify-ownership-of-a-webflow-site-in-google-webmaster-tools" target="_blank">Learn more about verifying your site</a></div></div></div></div><div id="global-canonical-tag" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Global Canonical Tag URL</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || form.inProgress" ng-click="updateSeo(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="help big">Set the global URL to use in the canonical tag for this site so search engines know the proper URL to index and don't serve duplicate content.</div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="globalCanonicalTag">Global Canonical URL</label><input type="text" name="globalCanonicalTag" ng-model="meta.globalCanonicalTag" class="showError"/></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">All site pages will use this global canonical tag URL as their starting point and append the page's unique URL slug after it. <a href="https://moz.com/learn/seo/canonicalization" target="_blank">Learn more about canonical tags</a>.</div></div></div></div></form></div></div></div></script><script id="siteDetails_forms.html" type="text/ng-template"><ng-include src="'siteHeader.html'"></ng-include><div ng-controller="SiteFormsCtrl" loading-element="loading-element" class="container site-forms"><div class="loaded"><ng-include src="'siteMenu.html'"></ng-include><div data-automation-id="main-content" class="main-content"><form name="form" novalidate="novalidate"><div id="forms" class="section"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Forms</h3></div><div ng-show="!org &amp;&amp; !site.workspace" class="help big">When a form is submitted on your published website, Webflow automatically collects the submission and displays it here. 
Email notifications can optionally be enabled and will come from&nbsp;<span ng-if="!whitelabelFormsOk">the branded email no-reply@webflow.com</span><span ng-if="whitelabelFormsOk">unbranded email no-reply@webforms.io</span>. </div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-hide="whitelabelFormsOk"><span><span>To receive email notifications from an unbranded email address (no-reply@webforms.io),&nbsp;<a href="/dashboard/account/plans?ref=forms_branding">upgrade to the Professional plan.</a></span></span></div></div><div id="notification" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Form Notification</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || !form.$dirty || !allowCustomForms" ng-click="update(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="isFreePlan"><span><a href="/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=forms">Set up hosting </a>&nbsp;to customize your form submission notifications.</span></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="emailFormFromLabel">From Name:</label><input type="text" placeholder="Webflow Forms" ng-pattern="/^[A-Za-z0-9._%+ &amp;/-]+$/" ng-model="site.emailFormFromLabel" ng-minlength="4" ng-maxlength="100" class="showError"/></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">Set the label of the sender of the email. Cannot contain any ":" and other special characters.<br/>Note: the sender email address is:  <span ng-show="whitelabelFormsOk">'no-reply@webforms.io'. </span><span ng-show="!whitelabelFormsOk">'no-reply@webflow.com'. </span><a ng-click="toggleMore = true" ng-hide="toggleMore || whitelabelFormsOk" href="#">Learn more</a><p ng-show="toggleMore">Upgrade to the <a href="/dashboard/account/plans?pro=1">Professional plan</a> to utilize our non-branded email address: <br/><a href="#">no-reply@webforms.io</a></p></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="emailFormTarget">Send form submissions to:</label><input type="text" placeholder="your@email.com" ng-model="site.emailFormTarget" ng-minlength="4" class="fs-hide showError"/></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">A comma separated list of emails to send form submissions to. Leave empty if you don't want emails to be sent.</div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="subjectLine">Subject Line:</label><input type="text" placeholder="{{subjectLinePlaceholder}}" ng-model="site.emailFormSubject" ng-minlength="4" class="showError"/></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down"><p ng-show="user.plan == &quot;free&quot; &amp;&amp; !org">Form notification emails will have a subject line that starts with<b>[Webflow Forms]</b>. Upgrade to a paid plan to remove Webflow branding.</p><p> 
Available variables are: <strong>siteName</strong>, <strong>formName</strong>.</p></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="emailFormReplyTo">Reply To Address:</label><input type="text" placeholder="no-reply@webforms.io" ng-model="site.emailFormReplyTo" ng-minlength="4" class="fs-hide showError"/></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down">Enter the email address that you want replies to your form emails to go to. 
You can use your form field names as variables here, e.g., enter <strong ng-non-bindable="ng-non-bindable">{{ Name }} &lt; {{ Email }} &gt; </strong>to use the input from your form's "Email" field. Only ASCII characters are supported in this field.</div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="emailFormTemplate">Email Template:</label><textarea ng-model="site.emailFormTemplate" placeholder="{{ emailTemplatePlaceholder }}" class="showError"></textarea></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div ng-non-bindable="ng-non-bindable" class="help shift-down"><p>This is the body of the email. You can introduce variables from the form using the <strong>{{ formData }}</strong> syntax. HTML formatting is also allowed in the email.</p><p> 
Available variables are: <strong>siteName</strong>, <strong>formName</strong>, <strong>formData </strong>and <strong>formDashboardUrl</strong>.</p></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label>Form submission count:</label></div><div class="col-md-8"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="site.emailFormOptions.incSubInfo"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="site.emailFormOptions.incSubInfo">Submission count is <strong>included </strong>in the form notification email</span><span ng-if="!site.emailFormOptions.incSubInfo">Submission count is <strong>not included </strong>in the form notification email</span></div></div></div></div><!-- unsub link hidden for now--><div ng-show="false" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label>Unsubscribe link:</label></div><div class="col-md-8"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="site.emailFormOptions.incUnsubLink"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="site.emailFormOptions.incUnsubLink">Unsubscribe link is <strong>included </strong>in the form notification email</span><span ng-if="!site.emailFormOptions.incUnsubLink">Unsubscribe link is <strong>not included </strong>in the form notification email</span></div></div></div></div></div></form><form name="formRecaptcha" novalidate="novalidate"><div id="recaptcha" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>reCAPTCHA Validation</h3><button ng-disabled="formRecaptcha.$invalid || !formRecaptcha.$dirty" ng-click="updateRecaptcha(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div class="help big"> 
reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that ensures your forms are only submitted by real humans, protecting you from spam and abuse. Check out <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/recaptcha?utm_source=form-settings">our reCAPTCHA guide</a>.</div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label class="fs-hide showError"/></div><div class="col-lg-4 col-4 col-sm-12"><div class="help shift-down"><a href="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin" target="_blank">Register for a new key.</a></div></div></div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="recaptchaSecretKey">reCAPTCHA v2 Secret Key:</label><input type="text" placeholder="" for="recaptchaRequired">Enable reCAPTCHA:</label><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert warning" ng-show="!site.recaptchaSiteKey || !site.recaptchaSecretKey"><span> <span>Site key and secret key must be entered before enabling.</span></span></div><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="site.recaptchaRequired" on-label="Yes" off-label="No"></switch><div class="switch-description If you're working on this site for a client, you should not view the form submissions.</div><div ng-if="!visibleFormData" class="row"><div class="col-md-8"><button ng-click="showFormSubmissions()" href="#" class="button">Show Form Submissions</button></div></div><div ng-if="visibleFormData" class="row"><div class="col-md-8"><button ng-click="hideFormSubmissions()" href="#" class="button">Hide Form Submissions</button></div></div></div><div class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Restrict uploaded file access</h3></div><div class="help big">Turn this <strong>on </strong>to restrict access to files uploaded through your site's forms to people who are logged in to your site, i.e., you, your client, and collaborators. Turn it  <strong>off </strong>to allow public access to files, which you might need for certain publishing formats or integrations, like Zapier.</div><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><div class="switch-wrapper"><switch ng-model="site.formFileLoginRequired"></switch><div class="switch-description no-border"><span ng-if="site.formFileLoginRequired">Login is <strong>required</strong></span><span ng-if="!site.formFileLoginRequired">Login is <strong>not required</strong></span></div></div></div></div></div><div class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Form Submission Data</h3></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-show="isFreeStaging || isEnhancedStaging || isBasicHosting || isCMSHosting || isBusinessHosting"><span><span ng-show="isFreeStaging"><strong>{{formSubmissions}}/{{formSubmissionLimit}}</strong> form submissions received on {{ planPlainName }}. <a href='/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=form_dash_warning'>Add a site plan</a> to get more submissions.</span><span ng-show="isEnhancedStaging"><strong>{{formSubmissions}}/{{formSubmissionLimit}}</strong> form submissions received this month (ending {{monthlyCountEnd}}) on {{ planPlainName }}. <a href='/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=form_dash_warning'>Add a site plan</a> to get more submissions.</span><span ng-show="(isBasicHosting || isCMSHosting) &amp;&amp; hasRemainingFreeFormSubmissions"><strong>{{formSubmissions}}/{{formSubmissionLimit}}</strong> form submissions received this month (ending {{monthlyCountEnd}}) on {{ planPlainName }}. <a href='/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=form_dash_warning'>Upgrade your site plan</a> to get more submissions.</span><span ng-show="(isBasicHosting || isCMSHosting) &amp;&amp; !hasRemainingFreeFormSubmissions"><strong>{{formSubmissions}}/{{formSubmissionLimit}}</strong> form submissions received this month (ending {{monthlyCountEnd}}) on {{ planPlainName }}. You'll be charged ${{overageCost}} for the {{submissionOverage}} submissions over your limit. <a href='/dashboard/sites/{{ site.shortName }}/hosting?ref=form_dash_warning'>Upgrade your site plan</a> to get more submissions.</span><span ng-show="isBusinessHosting"><strong>{{formSubmissions}}/unlimited</strong> form submissions received this month (ending {{monthlyCountEnd}}) on {{ planPlainName }}.</span></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-hide="visibleFormData"><span><p>Form submission data is <strong>hidden </strong>because you told us you're not the owner of the associated site.</p></span></div><div ng-show="visibleFormData" ng-repeat="formName in formNames" class="formData"><h4>{{ formName }}</h4><div class="subtext">Submission Data</div><div class="data overflow-x-auto"><table class="table table-bordered"><thead><th>Date</th><th ng-repeat="fh in formHeaders(formName) track by $index">{{ fh }}</th></thead><tr ng-repeat="entry in formData[formName].submissions | orderBy: '-d'"><td>{{ entry.d | fromNow }}</td><td ng-repeat="d in getFormData(entry.data, formName) track by $index"><a ng-if="d.url" href="{{d.url}}" target="_blank" class="file-url">{{d.displayUrl}}</a><span ng-if="!d.url">{{ d }}</span></td><td class="icon-centered"><a href="#" ng-click="deleteFormSubmission(site, entry._id, formName)"><i class="icon delete-medium"></i></a></td></tr></table><a ng-click="loadMore(formName)" href="#" ng-hide="hideMore[formName]" class="button secondary full-width"><i class="icon show-more"></i>Show More</a></div><div class="row"><div class="col-md-8"><button href="#" ng-click="csv(formName)" class="button black right-margin">Download CSV</button><a href="#" ng-click="deleteForm(formName)" class="link-button danger">Delete</a></div><div class="col-md-4"></div></div></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-show="formNames.length &lt; 1 &amp;&amp; visibleFormData"><span>No form submissions to show.</span></div></div></div></div></div></script><script id="siteDetails_code.html" type="text/ng-template"><ng-include src="'siteHeader.html'"></ng-include><div ng-controller="SiteCodeCtrl" loading-element="loading-element" class="container"><div class="loaded"><ng-include src="'siteMenu.html'"></ng-include><div data-automation-id="main-content" class="main-content"><form name="form" novalidate="novalidate"><div id="custom-code" class="section"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Add Custom HTML &amp; CSS</h3></div><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="help big">Adding custom code is sometimes needed for ultimate flexibility. You can save your progress by pressing Cmd+Shift+S (Ctrl+Shift+S on Windows).</div><div ng-if="!allowCustomCode" class="help big">You can add custom code to extend Webflow's native capabilities. Code you add here will be added to every page of your site. Use the page setting's custom code areas to add code you only need on specific pages.</div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert upgrade" ng-if="!allowCustomCode"><span><span><span ng-if="ownerType === 'user'">Add a paid site plan or upgrade your account plan to add custom code to your site.&nbsp;</span><span ng-if="ownerType === 'org'">Add a paid site plan or upgrade your team plan to add custom code to your site.&nbsp;</span><span ng-if="ownerType === 'workspace'">Add a paid site plan to add custom code to your site.&nbsp;</span><a ng-href="/dashboard/sites/{{site.shortName}}/{{ownerType === 'workspace' ? 'billing' : 'hosting'}}?ref=dash_custom_code">Add a site plan.</a></span></span></div></div><div id="head-code" class="section"><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="section-header"><h3>Head Code</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || form.inProgress" ng-click="update(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="field"><label for="head">Add code at the end of the &lt;head&gt; tag:</label><div class="position-relative"><div class="code-editor"><textarea ui-codemirror="ui-codemirror" ui-codemirror-opts="editorOptions" ng-model="meta.head"></textarea></div></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-if="getSyncJsScriptsInHead().length"><span><div>Adding external &lt;script&gt; tags to the of your site can slow down page loads. Consider adding the "async" or "defer" attribute in the &lt;script&gt tag for the following files to improve performance:</div><ul class="balanced"><li ng-repeat="jsFile in getSyncJsScriptsInHead()">{{jsFile}}</li></ul><div> <a ng-href="https://javascript.info/script-async-defer" target="_blank">Read more</a> about the "async" and "defer" attributes.</div></span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span>Webflow doesn't validate custom code for you, so be sure to check your code before publishing.</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span>Make sure your custom code won't create any security vulnerabilities. Unsecured code could expose sensitive customer information!</span></div></div></div><div id="footer-code" class="section"><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="section-header"><h3>Footer Code</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || form.inProgress" ng-click="update(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="field"><label for="post">Add code before &lt;/body&gt; tag:</label><div class="position-relative"><div class="code-editor"><textarea ui-codemirror="ui-codemirror" ui-codemirror-opts="editorOptions" ng-model="meta.postBody"></textarea></div></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span>Webflow doesn't validate custom code for you, so be sure to check your code before publishing.</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert caution"><span>Make sure your custom code won't create any security vulnerabilities. Unsecured code could expose sensitive customer information!</span></div></div></div><div id="advanced" class="section"><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="section-header"><h3>Advanced Settings</h3><button ng-disabled="form.$invalid || form.inProgress" ng-click="update(site)" href="#" class="button success">Save Changes</button></div><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="base">Base Tag: (href=)</label><input type="text" name="base" ng-model="meta.base" ng-minlength="1" placeholder="http://example.com"/></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">The HTML Base Element (&lt;base&gt;) specifies the base URL to use for all relative URLs contained within a document. Note - this is a super advanced feature if you are doing something unsupported by Webflow's hosting. Use at your own risk! <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/base" target="_blank">More Information</a>. </div></div></div><div ng-if="allowCustomCode" class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="siteBasePath">Href Prefix</label><input type="text" name="siteBasePath" ng-model="meta.siteBasePath" ng-minlength="1" placeholder="/blog"/></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down"><a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/what-is-the-href-prefix-and-how-to-set-up-webflow-hosting-on-existing-sites" target="_blank">Set a prefix for internal page links</a>. This won’t affect external links, mail or phone links, or links that get their value from the link, email, or phone fields.</div></div></div></div></form><div id="files" ng-if="undefined" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Files Uploaded</h3></div><files-uploaded site-id="siteId"></files-uploaded></div></div></div></div></script><script id="siteDetails_cms.html" type="text/ng-template"><ng-include src="'siteHeader.html'"></ng-include><div ng-controller="SiteCMSCtrl" class="container cms-settings"><ng-include src="'siteMenu.html'"></ng-include><div loading-element="loading-element" data-automation-id="main-content" class="main-content"><div class="loaded"><div id="editor" class="section"><div class="section-header first"><h3>Editor Settings</h3></div><div class="help big">The Editor lets collaborators quickly and easy manage their site content. <br/><a href="https://university.webflow.com/topic/the-editor" target="_blank">Learn more about the Editor.</a></div></div><div id="collaborators" class="section"><div class="section-header"></div><h3>Collaborators</h3><div class="help big">Invite clients or coworkers to manage their site with the Editor and we’ll send them instructions. <a href="https://university.webflow.com/lesson/editing-content-on-the-live-website-with-the-cms" target="_blank">Learn more about the Editor.</a></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info dark" ng-show="collaborators.length &gt; 1 || (org &amp;&amp; collaborators.length &gt; 0)"><span><span>Collaborators can log into the Editor by adding <b>?edit </b>to the end of their website's URL. data-automation-id="new-password-input" class="showError"/><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.newPassword.$error.required &amp;&amp; showError"><span>Your new password is required</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="form.newPassword.$error.minlength"><span>Your new password must be at least 10 characters</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="newPassword &amp;&amp; form.newPassword.$error.match"><span>Your new password can't be the same as your old password</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="newPassword &amp;&amp; form.newPassword.$error.hasLowercase"><span>Your new password must contain at least one lowercase character</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="newPassword &amp;&amp; form.newPassword.$error.hasUppercase"><span>Your new password must contain at least one uppercase character</span></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert not-allowed" ng-show="newPassword &amp;&amp; form.newPassword.$error.hasNumber"><span>Your new password must contain at least one number</span></div></div><div class="col-md-4"><div class="help shift-down">At least 10 characters including a number, uppercase, and lowercase letter.</div></div></div></div></form><form name="twofactor"><div id="two-factor-auth" class="section"><div class="section-header last"><h3>Two-Factor Authentication</h3></div><div class="help big">Enabling this will provide an extra layer of security for your account.  When logging in, we will ask for a special authentication code from your device.</div><a ng-disabled="inProgress" ng-click="provisionTwoFactor()" ng-show="!user.twoFactorEnabled &amp;&amp; !provisioningTwoFactor" class="button">Enable Two-Factor Authentication</a><div ng-show="user.twoFactorEnabled" class="section"><div class="alert success"><p>Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account.  <a ng-click="showDisableTwoFactor()">Want to disable it?</a></p></div><div ng-show="disablingTwoFactor" class="offset-form"><h4>Disable two-factor authentication</h4><p> 
To disable it, enter the 6-digit authentication code and confirm.  <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-enable-two-factor-authentication-for-your-webflow-account#retrieving-a-lost-authentication-code" target="_blank">Lost your authentication device?</a></p><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="token">Authentication Code:</label><input type="text" name="token" placeholder="xxxxxx" ng-model="token" ng-minlength="6" required="required"/></div></div><a ng-disabled="inProgress || twofactor.$invalid" ng-click="disableTwoFactor()" class="button">Confirm Code</a></div></div><div ng-show="provisioningTwoFactor" class="section"><div class="section-title"><span class="registration-step">Step 1</span><span>Install authentication app</span></div><p> 
You need a two-factor authentication app to scan the QR code and generate codes when you are asked during login.  We recommend Google Authenticator, available on the <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/google-authenticator/id388497605?mt=8" target="_blank">Apple App Store </a>or <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.authenticator2" target="_blank">Google Play</a>.</p><p>Need more help? <a href="https://university.webflow.com/article/how-to-enable-two-factor-authentication-for-your-webflow-account" target="_blank">Learn more about setting up two-factor authentication</a>.</p><div class="section-title"><span class="registration-step">Step 2</span><span>Scan QR code</span></div><p>When prompted by your authentication app, scan the image below to authorize your device.</p><img ng-src="{{twoFactor.qrCode}}" width="250" height="250" class="qr"/><p>Alternatively, you can enter the following code manually in your authentication app:</p><p><code ng-bind="twoFactor.secret"></code></p><div class="section-title"><span class="registration-step">Step 3</span><span>Save your secure backup codes</span></div><p>You can use these codes to access your account in the future, if you lose your two-factor device. Each code is good for one use only. Copy and save them somewhere safe — we won’t show them again!</p><pre>{{ twoFactor.backupCodes.join('\n') }}</pre><div class="section-title"><span class="registration-step">Step 4</span><span>Enter your authentication code</span></div><p>Enter and confirm the 6-digit code from your authentication app.</p><div class="field row"><div class="col-md-8"><label for="token">Authentication Code:</label><input type="text" name="token" placeholder="xxxxxx" ng-model="token" ng-minlength="6" required="required"/></div></div><a ng-disabled="inProgress || twofactor.$invalid" ng-click="confirmTwoFactor()" ng-show="provisioningTwoFactor" class="button">Confirm Code</a></div></div></form><div id="account-security-activity" class="section"><div class="section-header last"><h3>Account Security Activity</h3></div><div aria-live="assertive" class="alert info" ng-show="!accountSecurityLog || accountSecurityLog.length &lt; 1"><span><span>No account security activity has been recorded yet.</span></span></div><table ng-show="accountSecurityLog.length &gt; 0" class="table table-bordered"><thead><tr><th>Date</th><th>Event</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr ng-repeat="event in accountSecurityLog"><td>{{ event.date | fromNow }}</td><td ng-switch="event.activity"><span ng-switch-when="email_changed">Email changed</span><span ng-switch-when="login">Login</span><span ng-switch-when="logout">Logout</span><span ng-switch-when="2fa_enabled">Two-factor enabled</span><span ng-switch-when="2fa_disabled">Two-factor disabled</span><span ng-switch-when="password_reset">Password reset</span><span ng-switch-when="password_changed">Password changed</span><span ng-switch-default="ng-switch-default">{{ event.activity }}</span></td></tr></tbody></table><a ng-click="loadMoreAccountSecurityLog()" ng-show="!accountSecurityLogAllLoaded" class="button secondary full-width"><i class="icon show-more"></i>Show More</a></div><div id="delete-account" class="section"><div class="section-header"><h3>Delete Account</h3><a href="#" ng-click="!cantDeleteReason &amp;&amp; deleteAccount()" ng-disabled="cantDeleteReason" uib-tooltip="{{cantDeleteReason ? 'Contact support to delete your account' : ''}}" class="button danger">Delete Account</a></div><div class="description">Delete your account, including all your Webflow projects and live websites. {{ stripeSubItem.plan.metadata.name | formatPlanName }} {{ total | formatMoneyWithLettersAndSymbol:stripeSubItem.plan.currency }} / {{interval}}</strong><div ng-if="(showExistingGracePeriodBanner || showNewGracePeriodBanner) &amp;&amp; gracePeriodNewPrice" class="grace-period-secondary-banner">Your plan will increase to {{ gracePeriodNewPrice | formatMoneyWithLettersAndSymbol:stripeSubItem.plan.currency }}/{{interval}} + any applicable taxes, discounts, or credits on the first billing renewal after {{showNewGracePeriodBanner ? newPlanExtensionDate : existingPlanExtensionDate }}. This price is the base price of your Site plan and excludes any applicable taxes, discounts or credits. Please check your invoice for additional details.</div><span ng-show="isPartOfTaxBeta" data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-applicable-taxes">&nbsp;+ applicable taxes</span></td><td ng-hide="useNewBillingSystem" class="value planName"><strong data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-total-legacy">{{ subscription.plan.metadata.name | formatPlanName }} {{ total | formatMoneyWithLettersAndSymbol:subscription.plan.currency }} / {{interval}}</strong></td></tr><tr ng-show="isEnterpriseLiteSite"><td class="key">Total</td><td class="value planName"><strong data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-custom">Custom Pricing</strong></td></tr><tr><td class="key">Subscription Status</td><td ng-show="siteSubscription &amp;&amp; subscriptionStatus() === 'pay_later'" data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-status-pay-later" class="value">Customer will be billed on {{ siteSubscription.paidUntil | dateProfile }}</td><td ng-show="siteSubscription &amp;&amp; subscriptionStatus() !== 'pay_later'" data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-status-pay-now" class="value">{{ siteSubscription.subscription | subscriptionStatus | _s:"humanize" }}</td><td ng-show="subscription &amp;&amp; !siteSubscription" data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-status-nosite-subscription" class="value">{{ subscription | subscriptionStatus | _s:"humanize" }}</td></tr><tr ng-show="subscription.cancel_at_period_end"><td class="key"> <strong>De-Activation Date</strong></td><td data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-deactivation-date" class="value">{{ subscription.current_period_end | dateS }}</td></tr><tr ng-show="subscription.status == 'canceled'"><td class="key">Canceled On</td><td data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-cancel-date" class="value">{{ subscription.canceled_at | dateS }}</td></tr><tr ng-hide="subscription.status == 'trialing'"><td class="key">Billing Period Start</td><td data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-period-start" class="value">{{ subscription.current_period_start | dateS }}</td></tr><tr ng-hide="subscription.status == 'trialing' || subscription.status == 'canceled'"><td class="key">Billing Period End</td><td data-automation-id="TeamDashboard-site-invoice-period-end" class="value">{{ subscription.current_period_end | dateS }}</td></tr><tr ng-show="!useNewBillingSystem &amp;&amp; false" style="text-decoration: none;" class="plan-cost-new">&nbsp;</span><span ng-show="planState.period == 'year'" class="cost"><span ng-if="hasGracePeriodPricing &amp;&amp; !isEcommercePlan('ecommerce_advanced')">{{ hosting_ecommerce_advanced_pre_pnp.yearlyRate.usd / 12 | formatMoneyRoundZero }}</span><span ng-if="!hasGracePeriodPricing || isEcommercePlan('ecommerce_advanced')">{{ hosting_ecommerce_advanced.yearlyRate.usd / 12 | formatMoneyRoundZero }}</span><span class="plan-period">/mo</span></span><span ng-show="planState.period == 'month'" class="cost"><span ng-if="hasGracePeriodPricing &amp;&amp;
